long_description: Perfect for those days when you'd rather not go outside, the Marmot Fusion jacket reminds you it's possible to be comfortable while training in wet and windy weather. Marmot Fusion jacket protects core heat with a stretchy windproof and water-resistant soft-shell fabric; interior lining wicks moisture to keep you comfortable during exercise. Zippered pockets shelter hands and a zippered chest pocket works with your media player. Drawcord hem and elasticized cuffs keep the fit nice and snug. The men's Marmot Fusion jacket features thumbholes to keep wrists warm and reflective highlights to increase visibility.
short_description: Perfect for those days when you'd rather not go outside, the Marmot Fusion jacket reminds you it's possible to be comfortable while training in wet and windy weather.
